title: Drawing, "Textile design: lines forming", 20th century
medium: Brush and gouache on white paper.
description: Lines in three shades of blue, running vertically and horizontally to form a plaid pattern on white ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile design: lines forming", 20th century.
20th century. Brush and gouache on white paper.. Gift of Max Wilner. 1942-87-10-a.
